ComTalk_024:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry... <sp:5:1:0>That clothing item is
impossible to enhance...
ComTalk_025:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry... <sp:5:1:0>It appears that it is impossible
to enhance that clothing item...
ComTalk_026:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>To enhance that item, I need some power
from my sisters.<sp:5:1:0> But they're still cowering
in their flower buds...
ComTalk_027:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I cannot enhance that clothing item with
my power alone.<sp:5:1:0> I need to borrow some
power from my sisters...
ComTalk_010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Have you got other clothes you'd like me
to <sp:5:1:0>work my magic on?
ComTalk_028:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I can't right now... <sp:5:0:0>However, if my sisters
were able to lend me their power,<sp:5:0:0> then I
could enhance that clothing item...
ComTalk_051:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oooh, do you feel it?<sp:5:0:0> The <sp:5:1:0>care <sp:5:1:0>I put
into it...
ComTalk_011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You want to know why you can't
enhance it? Allow me to explain...
ComTalk_029:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh? <sp:5:1:0>If you want me to enhance that
clothing item, then you will need to take
care of another one of my sisters...
ComTalk_012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'd love to enhance your clothing, but...<sp:5:0:0>
you're not wearing much, and you're
not carrying any either.
If you get your hands on some clothes
that look like they could be enhanced,<sp:5:0:0>
stop by.
ComTalk_013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Oh my...<sp:5:1:0> You're not wearing any clothes
that I can enhance? That won't do!

Let me take a look at your things.<sp:5:1:0>
Maybe we can find something I can
help you with...
ComTalk_054:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>There you are!<sp:5:0:0> Take it as a sign of
my...appreciation.
ComTalk_015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>With the power available to me...<sp:5:0:0>
I can enhance your clothing
<clr:0000>a fair amount<clr:ffff>.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Oh, the nerve of you coming here!
Please, go away.

You're just a monster who's after my
<clr:0000>blessing of clothing enhancement<clr:ffff>.

The world outside my bud is filthy with
gloom and full of monsters. Don't try to
deny it.
I know it's true. My older sister Tera
told me!

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Even the music I love is gone, and
until I hear the <clr:0000>sound of a flute<clr:ffff> out in
the world...
I'll never go outside again.
ComTalk_016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>With the power available to me...<sp:5:0:0>
I can <clr:0000>greatly<clr:ffff> enhance your clothing.
ComTalk_017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>With the power available to me...<sp:5:0:0> I can
enhance your clothing <clr:0000>to the maximum<clr:ffff>.
ComTalk_040:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Mmm... <sp:5:0:0>You're the one who brought the
musical troupe to me, aren't you?

Don't be shy. I could tell it was you, even
while I was hiding.

Perhaps your reward should be ME
joining you as a co-adventurer, hmm?

<snd:LaughS_01>Ha! <sp:5:0:0>I'm only teasing you...<sp:5:1:0> But you get
even cuter when you're blushing.
Talk_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I moved near the stable to grant my
<clr:0000>blessings<clr:ffff> to travelers.

If I heard the <clr:0000>sound of a flute <clr:ffff>played by a
musician in a troupe, I'd feel cheered up
enough to come out and face the world.
ComTalk_041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I really can't thank you enough, young
man,<sp:5:1:0> but that won't stop me from trying.

If you have the materials needed to
enhance a piece of clothing,<sp:5:0:0> I will
gladly help you.
So why don't you let me take a peek
in that little pouch of yours?
Talk_1009:
<snd:Sad_01>No matter how many times you ask, I'm
not going to leave my flower bud.

I know the world outside is filthy with
gloom and monsters. You can't deny it.

I won't offer my <clr:0000>blessing of clothing
enhancement<clr:ffff> to any of you monsters.
I can't even face what's out there now.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_00>I think that only the <clr:0000>sound of a flute<clr:ffff>,
played by a musician in a troupe, would
cheer me up enough to come outside.
ComTalk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Your scent, young man... It's a fragrance
that's familiar to me.

So...<sp:5:0:0>you have some clothing you want to
enhance and the necessary materials?<sp:5:0:0>
Why don't you let me take a look?
ComTalk_043:
<snd:TalkPositive>I think my little sister Mija said she was
planning to stay near a stable in Hebra
north of here...
ComTalk_044:
<snd:TalkPositive>I hear my younger sister Cotera is near
a stable not far from <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff>, off
in Necluda to the east.
ComTalk_101:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Oh, myyy... <sp:5:1:0>If you want to enhance that,
you'll need to save your rupees!
ComTalk_045:
<snd:Think>Oh my... I can feel it...<sp:5:0:0> <clr:0000>Two<clr:ffff> <sp:5:1:0>of my sisters
are still cowering in their flower buds.

Young man, if you meet them, would you
please soothe them too?

Consider it a...<sp:5:0:0>special request from me.
ComTalk_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Young man... <sp:5:1:0>I know what you've done
for my family. My sisters are grateful too.

♪I'm feeling extra special!♪<sp:5:1:0> If you
want to enhance your clothing, come
back anytime.
ComTalk_102:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I can't demonstrate my powers without
sufficient rupees.<sp:5:1:0> ♪Time to start saving!♪
ComTalk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh my... <sp:5:1:0>Do you have any other clothes
I can enhance right now?<sp:5:0:0> It doesn't seem
so. I would love to help...
ComTalk_103:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You don't have the necessary rupees...<sp:5:1:0>
♪All in good time, boy.♪
ComTalk_046:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Some sets of clothing, when each piece
is enhanced twice, will grant you a <clr:0000>new
power<clr:ffff> when worn.
If you can, give<sp:5:0:0> it<sp:5:0:0> a<sp:5:0:0> try!
ComTalk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you gather more materials or soothe my
sisters, come back to see me!
ComTalk_104:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Notice anything missing?<sp:5:1:0> Rupees,
perhaps? That enhancement requires
more than you can afford!
ComTalk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you find any new clothes that you want
me to enhance, come back to see me!
ComTalk_030:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh, myyy... You don't seem to have the
materials needed to enhance that
clothing item.
ComTalk_031:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>You don't have the necessary materials...<sp:5:1:0>
♪All in good time, boy.♪
ComTalk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So...<sp:5:0:0>have you picked which clothes you'd
like me to enhance?
ComTalk_032:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You don't have the necessary materials...<sp:5:1:0>
♪All in good time, boy.♪
ComTalk_033:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>Notice anything missing?<sp:5:1:0> You don't have
the materials needed to strengthen that
clothing item.
ComTalk_038:
<snd:Think>Oh my... I can feel it...<sp:5:0:0> <clr:0000>One<clr:ffff> <sp:5:1:0>of my sisters
is still cowering in her flower bud.

Young man, if you meet her, would
you please soothe her with her
<clr:0000>favorite music<clr:ffff>?
Consider it a...<sp:5:0:0>special request from me.
ComTalk_039:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I hope you feel<sp:5:0:0> the<sp:5:0:0> care<sp:5:0:0> I put into this...<sp:5:1:0>
Now, one more thing.

How about enhancing it<sp:5:0:0> one more time?


Some sets of clothing, when each piece
is enhanced twice, will grant you a <clr:0000>new
power<clr:ffff> when worn.
ComTalk_022:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh, no, no, no... <sp:5:1:0>I can't enhance this
clothing item.
ComTalk_023:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>No good... <sp:5:1:0>I can't enhance that
clothing item...
